word_mean: 铬：一种蓝白色的脆性金属
化合物中有几种是色素，而铬本身可用于耐久性电镀。铬在葡萄糖氧化中起作用，被认为是营养必需的微量元素

sentence.Network_en: The trimmings on the car are made of chromium.
sentence.Network_cn: 车上装的食品是用铬合金做的.

sentence.Network_en: Chromium supplements were used successfully in the treatment of diabetes (see Chapter 4).
sentence.Network_cn: 铬补充剂被成功运用于治疗糖尿病（见第4章）。

sentence.Network_en: Frequently chromium deposits are ground or lapped to size.
sentence.Network_cn: 铬镀后常常是通过磨削及研磨来达到尺寸.

encyclopedia.content: 铬（chromium）元素符号Cr，银白色金属，在元素周期表中属 ⅥB族， 铬矿原子序数24，原子量51.996，体心立方晶体，常见化合价为+3、+6和+2。1797年法国化学家沃克兰 (L.N.Vauquelin)在西伯利亚红铅矿（铬铅矿）中发现一种新元素，次年用碳还原，得金属铬。因为铬能够生成美丽多色的化合物，根据希腊字chroma（颜色）命名为chromium

entry.def: Chromium is a hard, shiny metallic element, used to make steel alloys and to coat other metals.

means.word_mean: 1. a hard brittle blue-white multivalent metallic element; resistant to corrosion and tarnishing
